exec git init
exec git config user.email i@example.com
exec git config user.name someone
exec git checkout -b main

exec git status --porcelain --branch
stdout '## No commits yet on main\n'

gitstatus
stdout '&{Porcelain:{NumModified:0 NumConflicts:0 NumUntracked:0 NumStaged:0 IsDetached:false IsInitial:true LocalBranch:main RemoteBranch: AheadCount:0 BehindCount:0} NumStashed:0 HEAD: State:Default IsClean:false}'
! stderr .
